currentWork: Feb 20 — BREAKTHROUGH: Direct DB pipeline (30x faster building submission). Barcelona: 15 buildings live. Dashboard content page fixed.

todaySummary.headline: Direct DB pipeline breakthrough (30x faster), 15 Barcelona buildings submitted, dashboard fixes, content system docs

sections.title: 🔥 Direct DB Pipeline
items: Eliminated Playwright browser entirely for building submissions
New: heroku run rails runner with heredoc → direct DB insert + S3 upload + GPT analysis
Performance: 9 buildings in 30 seconds (was ~90s/building with browser)
Scales to 600+ buildings per run — entire city pipelines in minutes

sections.title: 🏛️ Barcelona
items: 15 buildings submitted (6 from sub-agent + 9 via direct pipeline)
All images on S3, all GPT analyses completed
Still needs: Place page creation, Pinterest queue additions

sections.title: 🛠️ Fixes
items: Dashboard content page: fixed escaped template literals (v8 cache bust)
Content system and social style guide docs created

Enable Google Search Indexing API in Cloud Console
